about.headline: IT Student & Future Developer
about.p1: I'm a 4th-year Information Technology for Digital Industry (ITDI) student at Burapha University, passionate about creating innovative digital solutions that make a difference.
about.p2: My interests span across network systems, web development, API development, and cloud technologies. I have hands-on experience with both Windows and Linux servers, and I'm particularly enthusiastic about AWS and cloud deployment.
about.p3: I'm a responsible, eager learner who thrives in collaborative environments. I'm always ready to embrace new challenges and apply my knowledge to create maximum value for organizations.
